title: Type Ident
content:
Hi There,

Would anyone be able to help with identifying the typeface that has been used in this logo?

Cheers for any help you can give

Many Thanks  
gibbo

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Dreamboat.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012151752/http:/typophile.com/files/Dreamboat_0.jpg) | 128.31 KB |

 [‹ (x) Looking for ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ alternate characters {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012151752/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18213 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID vintage soda font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012151752/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39559 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Andy_Gibby

comments.content:
I don’t think it is a typeface. You’ll notice that the a’s in ’Dreamboat’ are not identical. Also the way the initial letters interlock can usually only be done by hand. This is the work of a lettering artist.

- Mike Yanega
